name: P521.KeyAgreement
desc: A mechanism used to create a shared secret between two users by performing NIST P-521 elliptic curve Diffie Hellman (ECDH) key exchange.

items.name: struct P521.KeyAgreement.PrivateKey
items.desc: A P-521 private key used for key agreement.

items.name: struct P521.KeyAgreement.PublicKey
items.desc: A P-521 public key used for key agreement.
